verbs.description: [V: Watching] [ARG1: TV] recently [ARG0: we] saw the Michael Cohen parade of lawyers in and out of cars and in and out of court buildings and heard his recorded phone tirades . I began to think about the utterly ignorant arrogance of “ Donald J. Trump ’s Personal Lawyer ” and ...
